title: II AABB Schema
description: Immersive Intelligence Axis-Alligned Bounding Box data

bounds.description: Stores named arrays of block bounds in format [X1,Y1,Z1,X2,Y2,Z2]

additionalProperties.description: Array of block bounds in format [X1,Y1,Z1,X2,Y2,Z2]

positions.description: Stores position(s) in multiblocks separated by commas (keys) and names of block bounds or arrays of them (values)

poi.description: Stores Points-Of-Interest in multiblocks. One POI can have multiple blocks assigned and vice versa.

anyOf.description: Inner position of POI in multiblock
Inner positions of POI in multiblock

tactile.description: Stores AMT Tactiles information. One AMT group can have multiple Tactiles.
